strength_details: Clear responsibilities focused on reporting and visualization.
Stable role within a large, established company (IBM).
concern_details: ASAP start date suggests potential for time pressure.
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers with 3+ years of experience.
Candidates comfortable with traditional BI tools and reporting.
probe_details: Clarify the reporting structure and team dynamics.
Understand the team size and composition.
Inquire about typical work hours and expectations.
summary.overall_assessment: This is a stable, well-defined data engineering role within a large, established company. The role focuses on traditional BI and reporting. Concerns include the lack of visa sponsorship and potential for time pressure due to the ASAP start date.
